assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: IndiaMART InterMESH Limited operates an online B2B marketplace that connects buyers with suppliers in India and internationally. Its platform serves small and medium enterprises, large enterprises, and individuals. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Noida, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Sudhir  Gupta
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP of Fin. and Accounts

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Manoj  Bhargava
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP of Legal & Secretarial, Company Sec. and Compliance Officer
